SELECT s0.stock_code, s0.lastDayCompare AS last_day_compare, s1.mean_ratio AS mean_ratio, s0.pct_chg FROM ( SELECT t0.stock_code, t0.volume / t1.volume AS lastDayCompare, t0.pct_chg FROM ( SELECT stock_code, volume, `close`, `open`, `high`, `low`,pct_chg FROM T_Stock WHERE trade_date = #{currentDate} ) AS t0 -- 最后一个交易日 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stock_code, volume,`close` FROM T_Stock WHERE trade_date = #{preDate} ) AS t1 ON t0.stock_code = t1.stock_code -- 倒数第二个交易 WHERE t0.volume / t1.volume > 2 -- 成交量是前一天的2倍 AND t0.`close` >= t0.`open` -- 收盘价 大于开盘价 AND t0.`close`/ t1.`close` > 1 ) s0 JOIN (
SELECT t0.volume / ( t1.mean ) AS mean_ratio, t0.stock_code FROM T_Stock AS t0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM( volume ) / 5 AS mean, -- 获取最近4个工作日的成交量平均数 stock_code FROM T_Stock WHERE trade_date IN ( SELECT trade_date FROM ( SELECT trade_date FROM T_Stock WHERE stock_code = '000001' and trade_date <= #{currentDate} ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 6 ) AS t ) and trade_date != #{currentDate} -- 获取最近4个交易日的交易时间 GROUP BY stock_code ) t1 ON t0.stock_code = t1.stock_code WHERE t0.trade_date = #{currentDate} AND t1.mean != 0 and t1.mean is not null AND t0.volume / t1.mean > 2 -- 当日的成交量是前4个平均数 ) s1 ON s0.stock_code = s1.stock_code;
SELECT trade_date FROM ( SELECT trade_date FROM T_Stock WHERE stock_code = '000001' and trade_date <= #{currentDate} ORDER BY trade_date DESC limit 1,1 ) AS t
SELECT trade_date FROM ( SELECT trade_date FROM T_Stock WHERE stock_code = '000001' and trade_date <= #{currentDate} ORDER BY trade_date DESC limit 1 ) AS t
SELECT trade_date FROM ( SELECT trade_date FROM T_Stock ORDER BY trade_date DESC limit 1,1 ) AS t
SELECT trade_date FROM ( SELECT trade_date FROM T_Stock_Week ORDER BY trade_date DESC limit 1,1 ) AS t
SELECT trade_date FROM ( SELECT trade_date FROM T_Stock_Week WHERE stock_code = '000001' and trade_date <= #{currentDate} ORDER BY trade_date DESC limit 1,1 ) AS t

SELECT t.counter, s.trade_date, s.stock_code, i.industry_name, i.stock_name FROM (SELECT count(*) AS counter, stock_code FROM t_volume_increase WHERE trade_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY stock_code HAVING counter > 1) as t LEFT JOIN t_volume_increase s ON t.stock_code = s.stock_code LEFT JOIN t_industry_stock i ON s.stock_code = i.stock_code WHERE s.trade_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY s.trade_date DESC, i.industry_name, t.counter DESC

SELECT ts.stock_code, sh.interval_days, ts.last_day_compare, ts.mean_ratio, ts.jq_l2, ts.zjw, ts.sw_l3, ts.trading_day, ts.gain FROM t_transaction_stock ts INNER JOIN t_Stock_Higher sh ON sh.stock_code = ts.stock_code AND sh.trading_day = ts.trading_day WHERE ts.trade_date = #{currentDate} ORDER BY
sh.interval_days desc

SELECT tf.volume / ts.volume AS counter, tf.stock_code FROM T_Stock_Half_Day tf LEFT JOIN (select stock_code, volume from T_Stock where trade_date = #{preDate}) as ts ON tf.stock_code = ts.stock_code WHERE tf.trade_date = #{currentDate} AND tf.volume / ts.volume > 1 ORDER BY tf.volume / ts.volume DESC;

SELECT t.*, i.industry_code, i.industry_name, i.stock_name FROM t_volume_increase t LEFT JOIN t_industry_stock i ON t.stock_code = i.stock_code WHERE t.stock_code IN ( SELECT t1.stock_code FROM t_stock t1 JOIN t_stock_10day_avg t2 ON t1.stock_code = t2.stock_code AND t1.low <= t2.avg_10day WHERE t1.trade_date = #{currentDate} AND t2.trade_date = #{currentDate} ) ORDER BY t.trade_date DESC, i.industry_name desc, t.volume_increase_ratio DESC

SELECT v.*, i.industry_code, i.industry_name,i.stock_name, r.main_net_inflow_3d as mainNetInflow3d, t.fund_flow as fundFlow ,t.turnover_rate as turnoverRate FROM t_volume_increase v LEFT JOIN t_industry_stock i ON v.stock_code = i.stock_code left join t_stock_fund_flow_rank r on v.stock_code = r.stock_code left join t_stock_fund_flow_tsh t on v.stock_code = t.stock_code
WHERE v.trade_date = #{currentDate} ORDER BY COALESCE(i.industry_name, '未分类'), v.volume_increase_ratio DESC
